summary: Frontend testing of 4 new Library & Navigation pages (Search, Discover, Offline, Saved). All pages load correctly with proper Swiss Grid styling and Narvo design system. All data-testid attributes present. Sidebar navigation (6 items) and mobile bottom navigation working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: All 4 new pages implemented correctly with proper data-testid attributes
Semantic label colors (FINANCE, TECH, POLITICS, etc.) properly configured in tailwind.config.js
Search page: Hero search, voice input, popular tags, sort toggle, bookmark functionality all working
Discover page: Featured hero with LIVE_BROADCAST badge, 4 podcast cards with play buttons, Radio Garden panel with frequency display
Offline page: Storage capacity bar, filter buttons (ALL/AUDIO/TEXT), file table with proper columns, empty state message
Saved page: SELECT_ALL, ARCHIVE_X, DELETE_SIG buttons, empty state with GO_TO_FEED button, story cards with checkboxes
Sidebar navigation: All 6 items (Feed, Briefing, Saved, Search, Discover, Offline) working correctly
Mobile bottom navigation: 5 nav items + More button working correctly at 375px viewport
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page or set localStorage.setItem('narvo_guest', 'true')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Four new Library & Navigation pages fully tested.
